acceptance-test-run.title: Podam will create an instance of a POJO but its interface types won't be instantiated
acceptance-test-run.name: testHolderOfPojoWithMultiInterfaces

test-step.description: Given a Custom Data Provider Strategy
Given a Podam Factory with external factory and custom data provider strategy
When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the object should be null
Then the object should be null
Then the two objects 2 and 2 should be equal
Then the collection should contain at least one element of type interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MultipleInterfacesListPojo]
Then the collection should contain at least one element of type interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MultipleInterfacesListPojo]
